channel.title: Comments on: Afterword: Not Your Average

item.title: By: Kent
item.dc:creator: Kent
item.description: +1 on rome wasn't built in a day. i got myself in this Ventura guitar project for many years, and had to go through trial and error, on top of learning MORE stuff about the guitar, and now i have FINALLY settled with what i ideally see what my guitar needs. f*ck it, life's what you make it. not sure where my flow of thought is going, but i agree on that last statement in this post. lol
item.content:encoded: +1 on rome wasn’t built in a day. i got myself in this Ventura guitar project for many years, and had to go through trial and error, on top of learning MORE stuff about the guitar, and now i have FINALLY settled with what i ideally see what my guitar needs. f*ck it, life’s what you make it. not sure where my flow of thought is going, but i agree on that last statement in this post. lol
